name: Organ Trail: Complete Edition
description:
Organ Trail: Complete Edition is an arcade game developed by The Men Who Wear Many Hats. It was originally released in 2015. It was published by The Men Who Wear Many Hats.
Organ Trail: Complete Edition is available on PlayStation 4 and PS Vita.
developers: The Men Who Wear Many Hats
publishers: The Men Who Wear Many Hats
